featured_projects.title: Label-free Protein Localization from Structural Signals in Lightsheet Microscopy Using a Cloud-Based Workflow
featured_projects.short_description: We aim to predict protein localization from pan-protein signals in LICONN lightsheet microscopy.

images.title: Protein prediction
images.description: PSD95 protein localization prediction from pan-protein signal.

featured_projects.title: Towards a Foundational 3D Image Encoder for Multi-Resolution Biological Understanding in Lightsheet Microscopy
featured_projects.short_description: We aim to create a foundational 3D image encoder model that can effectively capture multi-resolution features from lightsheet microscopy data, enabling advanced biological understanding and analysis.

images.title: Foundational Model Diagram
images.description: Diagram illustrating the architecture of the proposed foundational 3D image encoder for lightsheet microscopy data.

images.title: Some Downstream Tasks
images.description: Diagram illustrating some inital exploration in downstream tasks that can be performed using the foundational 3D image encoder.

featured_projects.title: A Scalable, modular pipeline for automated processing and segmentation for whole-brain light microscopy data
featured_projects.short_description: Image processing pipeline using cloud computing resources. It performs denoising, stitching, image registration to the Allen Atlas, cell detection and cell quantification.

images.title: Pipeline Overview
images.description: Overview of the most important steps in the lightsheet image processing pipeline.

images.title: Lightsheet Pipeline
images.description: Steps for lightsheet image processing pipeline

images.title: Cell Detection
images.description: Cell detection output in the lightsheet image processing pipeline.

highlights: Identification of brain structures using the Allen V3 CCF Atlas.
Quantification of cells in different brain regions

featured_projects.title: Large-Scale Cellpose: A package for scalable cell segmentation in large microscopy datasets
featured_projects.short_description: A package for running cellpose in large microscopy datasets using cloud computing resources.

images.title: Fast Cellpose Inference
images.description: Large-scale cellpose inference at 1 um resolution.

images.title: Segmentation Performance
images.description: Optimization of the segmentation performance. Rewrote cellpose to be more optimal.

images.title: Global Normalization Effect
images.description: Local vs Global normalization effect on cellpose segmentation.

images.title: Nuclear Channel Influence
images.description: Impact of nuclear channel on cellpose segmentation.

highlights: Compatible with OMEZarr and cloud computing resources

featured_projects.title: Large-Scale RNA Detection: A package for scalable RNA detection in large microscopy datasets
featured_projects.short_description: A package for running RNA detection in large microscopy datasets using cloud computing resources.

featured_projects.title: 3D Brain MRI Segmentation with Self-Attention
featured_projects.short_description: Deep 3D neural network for brain structures segmentation using self-attention modules in MRI images.

images.title: Coronal Plane Segmentation
images.description: Segmented brain MRI in the coronal plane using the proposed architecture.

images.title: Sagittal Plane Segmentation
images.description: Segmented brain MRI in the sagittal plane using the proposed architecture.

images.title: Architecture Diagram
images.description: Proposed 3D deep neural network architecture for the segmentation of 37 brain structures.

images.title: 3D Brain Visualization
images.description: Segmented brain using the proposed architecture in a 3D visual representation.

featured_projects.short_description: CNN-based model for dynamic traffic signal timing estimation at urban intersections.
